lines.text: They will dissect you! And they will kill you! In that order!
The only good human... is a dead human!
[last lines]
In one of the countless billions of galaxies in the universe, lies a medium-sized star, and one of its satellites, a green and insignificant planet, is now dead.
Taylor!
The only thing that counts in the end is power! Naked merciless force!
Glory be to the Bomb, and to the Holy Fallout. As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be. World without end. Amen.
May the Blessings of the Bomb Almighty, and the Fellowship of the Holy Fallout, descend upon us all. This day and forever more.

[singing]
Amen!
Mr. Taylor, Mr. Brent, we are a peaceful people. We don't kill our enemies. We get our enemies to kill each other.
You ask me to help you? Man is evil! Capable of nothing but destruction!
Someone, or something, has outwitted the intelligence of the gorillas.
That shouldn't be difficult.
What is more dangerous than famine, Doctor?
The unknown.

[praying]
The heavens declare the glory of the Bomb, and the firmament showeth His handiwork.
I reveal my Inmost Self unto my God.
Unto my God.

[singing]
Unto my God!
That thing out there, an atomic bomb... is your god?
If you are caught by the gorillas, you must remember one thing.
What's that?
Never to speak!
What the hell would I have to say to a gorilla?
When may we hope to be released?
You may hope whenever you wish.
He bleeds! The Lawgiver bleeds!

[indicating Nova]
She can't help you. She can't even talk! Don't harm her.
*We* never harm anyone, Mr. Brent. *You're* going to harm her.

[Dr. Zira pours a powder on Brent's wound]
Ow! What is that damn stuff?
You wouldn't know if I told you. Just relax. Among other things, I'm a trained vet.

[to a sleeping Nova]
Are you... what we were... before we learned to talk and made a mess of everything?

[as Nova slowly dies, gunned down by a gorilla]
Well, that tears it. Maybe we should just let the world blow up. The gorillas, every damned... what it comes to.
[with a dry little man-sob of despair]

[Intense, full of fury]
Taylor, come on. Come on!
Yeah.
Gorillas are cruel because they're stupid! All bone and no brain!
